varnish 1.0.7

The varnish package

Source: R/varnish-package.R
varnish-package.Rd

This package does not contain any useful R code. It serves to hold CSS, JS, and HTML styling for Carpentries lessons.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://carpentries.github.io/varnish/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/carpentries/varnish/issues/
